TASK: Craft an item of type: warped_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 33, "index": 10}, {"type": "grass", "quantity": 5, "index": 11}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "grindstone", "quantity": 9, "index": 16}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 49, "index": 17}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 12, "index": 18}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 22}, {"type": "orange_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 10, "index": 23}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 46, "index": 26}, {"type": "clay", "quantity": 59, "index": 27}, {"type": "pink_concrete_powder", "quantity": 36, "index": 28}, {"type": "cod", "quantity": 29, "index": 29}, {"type": "painting", "quantity": 48, "index": 32}, {"type": "jungle_fence_gate", "quantity": 47, "index": 33}, {"type": "pink_tulip", "quantity": 20, "index": 35}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 31, "index": 37}, {"type": "netherite_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft warped_stairs, I need to place warped_planks in a staircase shape in the crafting grid. The warped_planks are currently in slot 22, so I will move them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1
